Html:
Hi, I am all new to this wonderful tool.

I am trying to find the optimal "set" for my mage. It is working fine except for one thing:

-It is suggesting I equip two identical rings which is a quest-reward and you can thus only receive one of them.

How can I tell it to pick another ring in slot 2? I guess the same question goes for trinkets as well.
Right now the only way to handle this is to edit ItemCache.xml in a text editor, find the entry for that specific ring/trinket and add the entry for Unique as you can see on other items.
